reviews.review:
[h1] Portal 2-speaking name for lovers of games such as Half-Life and CS 1.6. [/h1]
So I went in in the morning and, running through various rooms to an energetic soundtrack, did not notice how evening came.
The next day, my old life seemed strange, because I want to use the portal and get to work or to the store for chips and cola.
[spoiler] the game is so not demanding that I was able to run it on my favorite calculator Casio fx-CP400 [/spoiler]

Love to burn more braincells? Here's the game for you. You can grab another friend to burn your braincells together as well.

O jogo é muito bom, a música e a dublagem são ótimas, gráficos muito bons pra época. A história é simples, mas mesmo assim muito boa, com reviravoltas inesperadas, piadas a todo momento e com personagem carismáticos. A mecânica de uso dos portais é única da franquia Portal. O jogo sempre implementa algo novo na gameplay, torretas, gel de pulo, gel de velocidade, gel que libera as paredes para usar os portais, cubos, cubos que refletem, raios lasers, trampolins, paredes transparentes, tubos que te levam para uma direção que pode ser invertida. Todas essas coisas vão sendo implementadas durante o jogo, te impedindo de achar as salas de teste repetitivas. Também tem um modo cooperativo que vem junto com o jogo, mas ainda não testei. Recomendo muito, porém acho melhor ter jogado o primeiro jogo antes, pois esse tem elementos mais complexos, então é melhor jogar o anterior para não chegar nesse perdido, se for comprar o primeiro jogo, recomendo comprar o pacote orange box.
Portal... what to say, I love the story and puzzles.

Fun puzzle game, singleplayer and multiplayer. Good story, interesting characters and lore, Wheatly is extremely goofy, even when evil, and ends on a good note. Multiplayer is very fun to goof off with friends, and I'd recommend it for even the multiplayer alone.

Уже легенда игра вышита в 2012 году, стала легендой улучена игра, на улучённом движке сюжет гораздо интересней чем portal 1, и русская озвучка стал лучше с 1 части, но если и свои минусы, но песни просто великолепны, и концовка завораживает и даже в 2020 году великолепна, но минус есть нет 3 части.

Great story and an overall super enjoyable game. I haven't finished it yet but the puzzles are entertaining yet challenging and as I mentioned before the story line is just awesome. I would definitely recommend playing through both Portal games, as it will help solidify the story game even more, but if you want a fun yet somewhat moderately-difficult game, this game definitely hits all the marks in my book.

This game is incredibly well crafted. Playing through it feels like playing through a movie. It’s the most immersed I’ve ever been in a game. Most of the time, games that are heavy on story will have extensive dialogue or intrude upon gameplay with cutscenes. Portal 2 instead melds the story with the gameplay. On the topic of gameplay, it’s great! The puzzles are all unique and feel fair to solve, and the game adds new mechanics that are used creatively. 

TL;DR this game absolutely nails story and gameplay, and never sacrifices one for the other.

Also worth mentioning, this game has an amazing co-op campaign. It’s constantly putting players in positions where they’re responsible for the life of another player. It makes for the funniest co-op session I’ve had in a while. (Once I disabled the low-budget in game voice chat and used Discord instead.)
